description:
Candice`s Abomasnow battled against Ash during his gym battle.
Abomasnow was also used by Candice when she wanted to show Dawn a more effective way of utilizing her Mamoswine`s Ice Shard to create a contest combination. In Candice`s demonstration, it combined its Ice Shard and Razor Leaf attacks to create a breeze containing ice fragments around her, thus showing how Ice Shard can be used to create a combination without freezing the partner Pok√©mon.
name: Yukinooh (Suzuna)
